ProductInfo.Features:
Astro Queo (TM) Tablets are designed and manufactured by Inspira Technologies, LLC an American Corporation based in San Diego CA. We pride ourselves in developing high quality tablets at affordable prices.
We feature a dedicated technical support team that is based in the United States to ensure the highest quality of support to our customers.
This is an excellent entry level tablet that is very capable of handling power demanding applications as well as simple web browsing, e-reading, video streaming and movie playback
This tablet comes with a 9 inch touchscreen and is equipped with an A13 processor and a Mali 400 graphic accelerator
It comes with 8GB of storage capacity (expandable up to 32GB) and 512MB of RAM
ProductInfo.Name: Astro Queo 9" Android Tablet (8GB Memory, Wifi, A13, 9 Inch 5 Point Multi Touch Screen)
